p: Data are expressed as the mean ± standard deviation (SD) from at least three independent experiments performed in triplicate. Statistical analyses and determination of IC 50/LC 50 were performed with Graph-Pad Prism 6.3 (GraphPad Software, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA). Comparison between more than 2 groups was determined using a one-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s test. A p-value < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
